metadata.title: CVE-2022-1674 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: NULL Pointer Dereference in function vim_regexec_string at regexp.c:2733 in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 8.2.4938. NULL Pointer Dereference in function vim_regexec_string at regexp.c:2733 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted input.

criterions.comment: vim package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
